unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Finding the Margin of Error Given an Interval: Vehicle Speed
question_text:
A $95\%$ confidence interval for a car's average speed (mph) on West Street is $(30,40)$.
From this interval, what is the margin of error for the car's average speed (in mph)?

choices.text: It cannot be determined from the information given.
